creator: maj.fil@gmail.com
text:
The tool runs some basic tests to make sure legal and other fun bs is sorted in an apache project. License headers, binaries, etc. etc.

http://creadur.apache.org/rat/

creator: grobmeier@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 30046
Apache RAT report from 13.03.2013

I just did a run of RAT 0.8 on todays source.

A few things need to be cared of, like looking at the 3rd party modules.

I did a run from the commandline, like:

java -jar apache-rat-0.8.jar /path/to/ripple-source > rat-13032013.txt

Questions is, if a simple ant script wouldn't be better. It would be possible to use it together with a CI system.
